question1.content-en: 1. In which sector of activity is your company active? (linked with your APE code)?
question1.content-fr: 1. In which sector of activity is your company active? (linked with your APE code)?

question2.content: 2. What is the number of employees in your company on 18/12/31 ?

question3.content: 3. What is the turnover of your company in the last fiscal year? (or annual budget for Public sector)

question4.content: 4. Do you develop digital services for internal or external use (sales to customers)?

question5.content: 5. What is the number of users of your digital services?

question.content: 6. Do you apply the rules and best practices for digital accessibility?
7. Have you optimized the states and printouts in your application tools (reduced number of pages when printing, ink consumption ...)
Do you integrate the principles of the ecodesign of digital services?
Do you use a modular application architecture?
Do you do a design review at the end of your application's development?

question12.content: Do you have a server or do you only work with one or more workstations?

question11.content: What is the overall storage volume of your corporate data (centralized on external hard drives, centralized server, NAS, SAN ...) in Terabytes (TB) useful?

question12.content: Do you have a server or do you only work with one or more workstations?

question13.content: Do you have a dedicated room, simple room or cupboard with bay dedicated to your IT infrastructure?
Do you have a dedicated room, simple room or cupboard with bay dedicated to your IT infrastructure?

question14.content: Is your computer room in house or at a host?

question15.content: What is the total area of your computer rooms (excluding technical infrastructure *)? (in m2)

question16.content: Do you know the PUE * of your Data Center?

question17.content: What is the rate of charge or energy use of your computer rooms?

question18.content: Have you led or are you planning actions to optimize your infrastructure? Especially :

question19.content: The purchase of non-IT equipment from IT rooms (air conditioning, air treatment, inverters, etc.) according to energy efficiency criteria

question20.content: Implementing the good practices of the "European Code of Conduct for DataCenter"?

question22.content: Regular monitoring of environmental indicators of computer rooms

question23.content: Environmental impact analysis of the datacenter in life cycle approach

question24.content: Optimizing the architecture and layout of rooms

question25.content: The urbanization of halls in hot / cold aisles

question27.content: The use of natural cooling sources (freecooling)

question28.content: Implementation of a heat recovery system for computer rooms (heating)

question29.content: The set temperature in the cold corridor remains higher than 24 Â°

question30.content: The choice of a modular datacenter architecture

question31.content: Have you led or are you planning actions to optimize your infrastructure? Especially :

question36.content: The correct sizing of the servers in relation to their use

question37.content: Give priority to ASHRAE 2 compatible equipment

question38.content: A procedure for provisioning and de-provisioning data-processing equipment in datacenters

question39.content: Do you know the number of physical servers and virtual servers in your company?

question40.content: How many physical servers do you have?

question41.content: How many virtual servers do you have?

question42.content: What will be the evolution of your number of physical servers for 2019? (in% or quantity)

question43.content: What will be the evolution of your number of virtual servers for 2019? (in% or quantity)

question44.content: Has your company appointed a Green IT Manager / Digital Manager?

question45.content: Do you have a responsible digital strategy broken down into an action plan?

question46.content: Is Green IT a topic integrated into your CSR strategy?

question47.content: Do you regularly evaluate the environmental impacts of your information system?

question48.content: Do you have a team of competent referees on the topics of Green IT?

question49.content: Have you integrated Green IT into your business strategy?

question50.content: Do you have those equipments in your compagny?

equimpments.content: Small printers (<15kg, potentially used by a household)
Other flat screens (TV, projection screen, digital board ...)
Fixed telephones (standalone not connected to such a standard)

question62.content: Do you have other devices in your company?

question63.content: Regarding other devices, do you have in your company:

question70.content: Do you know the consumption of your workstation in kWh per year?

question71.content: Do you track the energy consumption of your compagny activities?

question72.content: Do you know the share of IT and IT equipment in your company's total energy consumption?

question73.content: Have you set up a power management system? (automatic shutdown / shutdown of workstations)

question74.content: Do you use copiers from a repackaging industry (second-hand / second-hand)?

question75.content: Do you consolidate individual printers to shared printers?

question76.content: Have you set up an identification system on printers (to trigger printing)?

question77.content: What is the average life of your professional copier / MFP *? (* MFP Multi Fonction Printer)

question78.content: Are your printers set by default in eco mode? Especially :

question83.content: What is the number of pages printed / day / employee? (A4 equivalent)

question84.content: Can you specify the number of cartridges / toners:

question85.content: Do you organize the separate collection of waste cartridges / toners?

question86.content: Do you prefer the use of recycled paper?

question88.content: Do you organize the separate collection of waste paper for recycling?
